oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Discussion - Highway 40 Blues: Jefferson Street - 2004-09-25
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Panel discussion on the music and culture from Nashville's historic Jefferson Street from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on September 25, 2004. Presented in support of the exhibition Night Train to Nashville: Music City Rhythm and Blues: 1945-1970.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Dr. Reavis Mitchell; Sharon Hurt; Dr. David Padgett; Don "Sonny" Tyler; Earl Gaines; Robert Craighead;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Discussion moderated by Fisk University's Dr. Reavis Mitchell. Participants include Sharon Hurt from the organization JUMP; Tennessee State University's Dr. David Padgett; former Steal Away club owner Sonny Tyler; singer Earl Gaines; Robert Craighead of Craighead's Barber Shop;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Mitchell, Reavis; Hurt, Sharon; Padgett, David; Tyler, Don; Gaines, Earl; Craighead, Robert; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
